response.answer_text: It can be true or can not be true.I am telling that because there are 2 types of blogger are there.1) Newbie who are trying to make blog successfull.2) Experience Blogger who have a very successfull blogNewbies are trying to comment any types of blog becuase they need a do follow backlink for their blog.It will increase the DA & PA.But experience blogger comment on blog if they found the article mentioned in the blog is really helpfull for them.In this case some newbies also comment if they also found it is helpfull for them.And ofcourse they will also get a DO follow link from that blog also.Hope you like the ans.Connect with me fb.com/techpritam

My experience is that this isn't true. All comments have to start somewhere. Your question seems to suggest that it would be best to fake the first few comments, which I don't think makes sense. The question, for me, is if your blog post provokes comments out of people, which is usually the result of people either really liking what you wrote, or really disliking it.
